showerReviews.reviewText:
Always clean üòâ
That's why Love's is my favorite place for fuel ‚õΩ shower üöø food and parking üÖøÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

Once someone exits a shower the woman at the register puts the shower in use so that all the showers appear to be in use. Meaning if I wanted a shower and saw that none were available I'd probably pass if I didn't have time to gamble.  This ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
I stoped here to take a shower at this truck stop and they won‚Äôt accept my rewards card shower !!
They want me to pay for it !! So disappointed !! I will switch to loves‚Ä¶ better service and cheaper fuel anyway !!

Dont know what the other person was talking about them not taking shower credits, worked for me 8/8/25. Maybe their system wasn't quite set up yet to take the shower credit. Showers look new, good water pressure and hot water. Shower could ‚Ä¶
Amazing shower
Thanks for the clean and new shower!

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower: ‚Ä¶ More

Had a nice hot shower. Went for my salad, picked a good one. Went to the counter to auto pay and asked for salad dressing. Didn‚Äôt realize it was across from the salads. Nice to finally have a Pilot that lets you get your own salad dressing. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that the employees care. The fountain area was not so clean. When I got to my shower it wasn't all the way clean. The hand washing soap was empty, the toilet was loose on the floor and it has a hair line crack on it. You can actually see it ‚Ä¶

I wanted to get a hot shower on a cold windy day and got very disappointed. The water was slightly warm and the flow was very weak. I got very cold. Also the trash bins were all full and people had to leave the trash outside the trash bins. ‚Ä¶
Truck stop staff at night is terrible at night time u will always wait a 1hr to get a shower

There are just a couple of things we look for at the end of a drive day... clean hot shower (check), easy parking (check), and wifi.... nope... premium wifi here is horrible... .20 megs DL... almost as bad as dialup... my cell phones faster ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have to give a star to leave a review!  This stop would be a NEG 5 star...was waiting over an hour for a shower, not one shower was being used, they were all empty since the time I walked in.  I always try to see if they are cleaning them ‚Ä¶
Shower could use some TLC but the pressure and temperature were just right. I did not want to leave once the water hit my skin.

‚Ä¶ While waiting on a shower,  I did meander about, looking at the coffee and fountain drink area, all appeared clean and stocked.  Subway was clean and friendly.  The folks running the registers were polite and greeted most customers. ‚Ä¶

WIFI is horrible. Shower ap doesn't work. Best part.... Nasty lady working the counter told me no problems with our WiFi. I should have stayed at the Love's and paid to take a shower instead of using points of coming here. Here is a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice ,clean little truck stop. They have 1 shower and they provide a towel and wash rag. All for the low price of $8. Cleaner than most TA's. They have a small truck parking area that has probably 15-20 spots. The prices are cheaper than ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ There is 1 shower here which is convenient and it was very clean. They do provide a fresh towel and wash cloth. ‚Ä¶

Great crew and nice shower available for $8.00.
Parking $10.00 after 4 hours.
Excellent restaurant next door home cooking favorite Foods from 6am-3pm!
5 minutes away from Ameicold Appleton Wisconsin

Very friendly staff. The shower was well cleaned and not too small. The store is well kept and stocked. Limited hours but it gives the traditional values vibe. Diner Nextdoor is probably fantastic because it‚Äôs always full!
Only about 15 parking spots at $10 daily, shower price 8 or 10 dollars nice store, great dinner next door at good prices
This place is great. Really nice employees and shower is clean. They're pretty cheap on prices for sure
Nice and friendly staff $8 for shower. They only have one but it nice and clean with Hot waterü§ó. Truck parking for about 20 trucks behind the diner. It close at 11pm. ‚Ä¶
They close at 8pm have only one shower, the owners work there and they are amazing that made the five star.
Not too bad. Small Place, have obe shower
Good price for a shower but there's only one and it has no toilet in it

showerReviews.reviewText:
Clean, spacious truck stop. Polite staff.
Shower $8, towel included, no toilet, good water pressure.
Thank you for your business.
Very nice shower
Friendly staff.  Stoped for a Good shower.  Showers Don't have toilets.  Clean towels provided. Large parking lot parking.
Faith WashingtonLocal Guide ¬∑ 169 reviews ¬∑ 510 photos
Love this place, shower only 3 rooms, small but clean. Quiet parking and pretty spaces too. Easy access and clean.

My hats off to the gals at the counter I gotta shower and left my wallet at the counter. Well I was leaving the store and young women said is this your wallet. I would have driven all day tomorrow before I needed my wallet I can never thank ‚Ä¶
Clean Showers, Has a Subway inside. It's a small truck stop but it's very quiet and clean. I only paid $8 dollars for a shower. I would stay here again.
Nice and quite easy on easy off from Interstate,very clean shower,can't complain.
Two washers and dryers .. three shower rooms nice size 10$

Decent place with plenty of parking. But avoid the showers. $8 got me 1 old, threadbare towel and a washcloth but I was given a second towel on request. The shower room itself looked clean enough, but the water smells like it's being ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ driver should be hassled after a long day on the road when we run all day we're looking for parking a meal to eat and a shower not to be robbed by these truck stops that are looking for a quick buck DONOT STOP AT THIS TRUCK STOP!!!!!!!!!
Nice place good truck parking very nice people and good shower's
Shower was dirty the night cashier isn't friendly at all

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a bunch of different stuff. Clean bathrooms. Good shower rooms with decent water pressure good hot water nice and clean and spacious. But the shower rooms have no ac so it gets very very hot in there. Almost feels like you need a ‚Ä¶

This is only a review of the showers since That‚Äôs all I stopped for when I got here. Boy are they nice, obviously they are remodeled as is the whole truck stop. Not a fan of paying for parking but 2 hrs is plenty of time for me to shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to finish their 30 while you still have driving time. They have 2 hour free parking to take a shower and get your business done, pay $50 total in store (which includes tacobell. Dunkin'  showers  the blue badger grill and bar,etc).,get ‚Ä¶

This place is the worst place a been in when you try to use the shower from the ‚ùå the app You cannot use it if you go inside to use it they gonna do the same thing and you‚Äôre gonna spend 130 or  120 gallon with no shower and they charge you ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ doesn't. Its OK/ average, clean and lots of newly remodeled space. Brand new clean showers although they forgot to refill the toilet paper in mine (good thing the shower heads are hand-helds). Restaurant (Blue Badger) sucks. Long wait ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and out going. The store side and restaurant was clean. Did laundry and took showers everything was clean. Water very hot for our shower and shower room was large enough for both my husband and myself. Jennifer the cashier was ‚Ä¶
Really enjoyed remodeled shower, it's about time! Good job. Can't wait to see it when this facility gets full remodel, restaurant too.
Reviews said showers were clean. Yes they were! Water was hot and never ran out. ‚Ä¶

Garbage. Poor service, over priced and slow as Granny on a cold winter day. It took 2hrs and 2 minutes to get a shower and eat so they reward you with a $15 fee to leave the lot. Steer clear.....money grab! Stealing your $$$$ to pay for a ‚Ä¶
One of the last few clean and friendly truck stops. Clean shower,great food always great price for fuel. Bar and restaurant. Keep it in the same way guys.

showerReviews.reviewText: This truck stop is very NASTY shower disgusting not clean and the argue with you that they just cleaned them if this is clean, I would hate to see your house utterly disgusting. Look at the photos hairs and corn pads in the shower toilet ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Here if you buy diesel, you'll get free parking. If you spend $25 inside, you'll get free parking. If you buy shower you get free parking. The staff is nice and they have good variety of products inside. I wish they were all like this. Dri ‚Ä¶

New owners so now they charge for parking. I think it‚Äôs $15.00. I bought a $12.00 shower and got the parking for free. Nice shower. I would suggest bring your own towels. Lots of good near by walking distance. Workers there are really nice.
$12 for shower with towels, grab what you need from the rack by the counter. ‚Ä¶

Just took a shower at this facility. It was not by choice. It is definitely an old facility but the moment I walked in the door I could tell that the staff here really tried to do their best to give everyone a great experience there is a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for truck stops aren‚Äôt very high. This is a decent place to rest at. They have a large lot, a McDonald‚Äôs AND a subway‚Ä¶ showers (for 10$) which is a great price. They also have laundry two washers and two dryers. (1.50 to dry and 1.50 to ‚Ä¶
Holes in parking lot are big enough for a semi to get swallowed up. Shower rooms very hot had to dress in the hallway to cool off
Great staff and friendly atmosphere. Easy in and out it‚Äôs $15 for overnight parking or free with shower or $25 inside purchase.

2 stars only because the staff was nice to deal with.
Washroom/ shower was dirty. If I wasn't dirty, I'd have been after leaving.
Not much in food...McDonald's or Subway.
A few other choices across the street.

Not bad , fuel price is good , you have to leave $5 deposit for ur shower till u bring ur towel back to them , shower is not really comfortable but is ok for quick shower , driver waiting room old need update , they have McDonald‚Äôs there ‚Ä¶

One of my favorite American owned truckstop along the way. Well stocked, very clean restrooms, friendly and professional staff, fresh variety of food and groceries to help restock my trucker fridge. ‚Ä¶
Great selection of restaurants and grab-and-go food. Very clean location with friendly employees.
Been to many truck stops with clean restrooms but this was not one of them, and no toilet paper either, good think I carry my own, and the elder woman in the cashier has a bad attitude.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I‚Äôve ever been to. There‚Äôs soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

‚Ä¶ Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would ‚Ä¶

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this ‚Ä¶

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn‚Äôt clean at all and from the looks of it hasn‚Äôt been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn‚Äôt cleaning them, ‚Ä¶

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles ‚Ä¶
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* ‚Ä¶
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy
